Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Throw Like a Girl is a new queer comedy webseries shot mockumentary style with a pseudo film crew capturing the everyday lives of a group of women who work at We Can Play!, a small start-up that sells sports bras online and over-the-phone. Their workdays revolve around ego clashes, misunderstandings, inappropriate behavior and unrequited love.
imdb.title: Throw Like a Girl
plot: A mockumentary TV series that follows a close-knit group of women working at a small San Francisco Bay Area startup that sells sports bras.::meekthegeek

_Throw Like a Girl_ (qv) is a new queer comedy webseries shot mockumentary style with a pseudo film crew capturing the everyday lives of a group of women who work at We Can Play!, a small start-up that sells sports bras online and over-the-phone. Their workdays revolve around ego clashes, misunderstandings, inappropriate behavior and unrequited love.::Cathy Sitzes
synopsis: Throw Like a Girl is a mockumentary series that follows a group of women who work at a small San Francisco Bay Area startup selling sports bras.
